La Señora Libia tiene 32 años de edad, es madre soltera de 2 hijos de 8 y 4 años de edad, su primer hijo estudia en una escuelita de la localidad y su segundo se encuentra estudiando en un jardín de infantes. Vive en casa de sus abuelos ya que no tiene casa propia, pasa con sus abuelos ya que les hace compañía y a su vez comparten los gastos del hogar. 

Doña Libia se dedica a trabajar desde su casa, hace bordados en polleras, bolsicones, blusas, chalinas (todo esto es ropa típica de la región), teje chompas y bufandas, todo esto aprendió viendo a otras personas y fue solo habilidad y constancia, también se dedica a la cría de cuyes, pollos y cerdo, cultiva sus terrenos y sus cosechas solo para el consumo de su hogar.

Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de una maquina de coser para seguir agrandando su pequeño taller. 

Su sueño es tener un taller con operarios.
texts.en:
Libia has been a part of the “Mujeres de Chilcatotoras” communal bank for three years.  She is a hardworking woman who likes the communal bank because of the great camaraderie that exists within the group.  She lives in the Chilcatotoras sector, which is part of the Tarqui parish in Cuenca.  This parish is known for its green pastures and inspirational landscapes.  Its people maintain the cultures and traditions of their villages and raise livestock and farm.

Libia is 32 years old and the single mother of two children, ages 8 and 4.  Her oldest son attends a local school and her youngest attends kindergarten.  She lives at her grandparents’ house since she doesn’t have a home of her own.  She lives with her grandparents and keeps them company and helps them with the household expenses.

Libia works from her home and embroiders skirts, bags, blouses, scarves (all typical regional clothing); she knits sweaters and scarves and learned all of this by watching other people and through trial and error.  She also raises Guinea pigs, chickens, pigs, and raises crops but only for personal consumption.

She will use this loan to buy a sewing machine so that she can continue growing her small workshop.

Her dream is to have a workshop with employees.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Los Emprendedores De La Alborada Group

texts.es:
Este es el  grupo Los Emprendedores de la Alborada

Uno de sus miembros es Hellen de 24 años. Ella es separada y tiene 02 hijos, hace 02 años se dedica a la venta de pollo, tiene un puesto de venta en un mercado de su zona donde  la mayoría de sus clientas son amas de casa, los productos que vende son frescos y de calidad por eso tiene mucha clientela, con los ingresos que percibe por su trabajo puede darle a sus hijos una buena educación y solventar a su familia. Hellen trabaja todos los días y su mayor sueño en la vida es comprarse un puesto propio para poder  trabajar con tranquilidad, el préstamo solicitado lo invertirá en la compra de pollo por mas cantidad, así podrá ofrecer mejores precios a sus clientas que son sus fieles compradoras.
Hellen es la única mujer del grupo y la han nombrado tesorera del grupo, cargo que espera desempeñar con mucha responsabilidad. Esta agradecida por el préstamo que recibirá, sobre todo a los inversionistas de KIVA que  hacen posible su crédito.
texts.en:
This is the Los Emprendedores de la Alborada [Entrepreneurs of la Alborada] group. 

On of its members is Hellen, who is 24 years old. She is separated and has 2 children. She sells chicken and has a stall at the market in her area. Most of the customers are housewives and the products she sells are fresh and of high quality and that is why she has a lot of customers. With the income she makes from her work she can give her children a good education and pay her family's expenses. Hellen works every day and her biggest dream is to buy her won locale so she can work peacefully. The loan she has asked for will be invested in buying chicken in a higher quantity. That way, she can offer better prices to her customers, who are her faithful buyers. 

Hellen is the only woman of the group and has been named the treasurer. She hopes to carry out this duty with a lot of responsibility. She is grateful for the loan she will receive and above all to the KIVA investors who made her loan possible.

loans.use: to buy chicken

loans.name: Yanaturo Alto  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Yanaturo Alto está formado por 13 mujeres quienes son vecinas y amigas, con el banco comunal han afianzado y estrechado más su amistad, todas son mujeres trabajadoras, luchadoras que día a día tratan de mejorar la estabilidad económica de sus hogares. Viven por el sector de Yanaturo en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es la tercera de mayor importancia económica del país, es desde Diciembre de 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, su gente son personas amables, gentiles y de un corazón cálido, aun mantienen vivas las llamas de su cultura y tradiciones.

La Señora. María Delfina se encuentra realizando el segundo crédito en el banco comunal Yanaturo Alto, vive por el sector de la Floresta en la ciudad de Cuenca.

La Señora María Delfina tiene 37 años de edad, es una mujer casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 5 hijos de 20, 18, 12, 8 y 6 años de edad, su primer hijo se dedica a trabajar y le ayuda económicamente, su segunda hija pasa en casa ayudando con los quehaceres de la casa, su tercera hija estudia en el colegio y sus dos últimos hijos estudian en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo labora como empleado privado, la casa en la que viven es arrendada.

Doña María Delfina trabaja de lunes a viernes en la limpieza de las oficinas y aulas de una universidad, se dedica a esta actividad desde hace 6 años y le gusta este trabajo porque recibe un sueldo estable.

Como es una mujer emprendedora este crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos para empezar con este negocio. 

Su meta es tener su negocio propio como una tienda y también tener una carreta para vender carne en palito
texts.en:
The Yanaturo Alto communal bank is made up of 13 ladies who are friends and neighbors.  The communal bank has helped to solidify their friendship.  All of the women are hardworking and every day try to better the financial stability in their homes.

They live in the Yanaturo of the City of Cuenca.  Economically this is the third most important city in the country and has been a World Heritage Site since December of 1999.  Its people are friendly, gentle, have warm hearts and continue their culture and traditions.

María Delfina lives in the Floresta sector in Cuenca and is getting a second loan from the Yanaturo Alto communal bank.

María Delfina is 37 years old, married, and has five children, ages 20, 18, 12, 8, and 6.  Her oldest son works and helps out financially.  Her a oldest daughter helps in the home and her next youngest attends high school.  Her three youngest attend local schools. Her husband works as for a private company and they all live in a rented home.

María Delfina works Monday through Friday cleaning offices and classrooms at a university.  She’s been doing this for six years and she likes it because she gets a steady salary.  Since she is an enterprising woman, she will use the money from this loan to buy chickens to begin this business.

Her goal is to have her own business, such as a store, and also to have a cart so she can sell meat on a stick.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: María Florinda

texts.es:
La Señora. María es una socia que participa activamente en el banco comunal Mujeres de Chilcatotoras, forma parte de este hermoso grupo desde hace 3 años tiempo en el que ha afianzados los lasos de amistad con todas sus compañeras del grupo. Vive por el sector de Chilcatotoras que pertenece a la parroquia de Tarqui en Cuenca, esta parroquia  es reconocida por sus verdes pastos y sus paisajes inspiradores, su gente mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos, se dedican a la ganadería, crianza de animales y agricultura.

Doña María tiene 51 años de edad, es viuda pero en su unión conyugal ha concebido 7 hijos de 27, 25, 23, 22, 20, 18 y 15 años de edad, su primera hija es casada y vive independiente, sus tres hijos trabajan y le ayudan económicamente, dos de sus hijos le ayudan en los quehaceres de la casa, solo un hijo estudia en un colegio de la localidad. La casa en la que vive es casa de herederos.

La Señora. María trabaja desde su casa, como vive en el campo se dedica a la ganadería y la leche que obtiene de su ganado lo vende a los carros lecheros, cría cuyes y gallinas a los que los vende en su comunidad. También cultiva sus terrenos y lo que cosecha es  para el consumo de su casa.

Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cuyes, gallinas, alimento para animales y abono para sus potreros. 

Su sueño es tener un puesto en el mercado para vender sus animales.
texts.en:
Maria is an active member of the Mujeres de Chilcatotoras communal bank.  This lovely group was formed three years ago, along with the ties of friendship among all the members.  She lives in the Chilcatotoras sector, which is part of the Tarqui parish in Cuenca.  This parish is known for its green pastures and inspirational landscapes.  The people here maintain their traditions and culture.  They raise livestock and farm.

Maria is 51 years old, a widow, and has seven children, ages 27, 25, 23, 22, 20, 18 and 15.  Her oldest daughter is married and on her own.  Her three sons work and help her financially.  Two of them help with the household chores.  Only one son attends a local school.  

Maria works from home.  Since she lives in the country, she raises livestock and sells milk to milk distributors.  She raises Guinea pigs, and chickens and sells them in her community.  She also harvests her fields for consumption in her home, which she inherited.

She will use the money from this loan to buy Guinea pigs, chickens, animal feed, and compost for her pastures.

Her dream is to have a stall in the market so she can sell her animals.

loans.use: to buy animals, feed, and compost.

loans.name: Rosa Elvira

texts.es:
La Señora Rosa es una socia que conforma el banco comunal Mujeres de Chilcatotoras desde hace 3 años. Vive por el sector de Chilcatotoras que pertenece a la parroquia de Tarqui en Cuenca, esta parroquia es reconocida por sus verdes pastos y sus paisajes inspiradores, su gente mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos, se dedican a la ganadería, crianza de animales y agricultura.

La Señora. Rosa tiene 43 años de edad, está casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 6 hijos de 22, 19, 17, 14, 11 y 7 años de edad, su primer hijo es casado y vive independiente, dos de sus hijos trabajan y le ayudan económicamente, dos de sus hijos estudian en el colegio y su ultimo hijo está estudiando en una escuelita de la localidad. 

Doña Rosa pasa la mayor parte de su tiempo en casa dedicada a los quehaceres de su hogar y al cuidado sus hijos, pero para aportar a la economía de su hogar se dedica a la cría y venta de cuyes, gallinas, cerdos y ganado, también se dedica a la agricultura y lo que cosecha es para el consumo de su hogar. 

Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cuyes, gallinas y libros para el estudio de sus hijos. 

Su sueño es tener un puesto en el mercado para vender sus animales.
texts.en:
Rosa has been a member of the “Mujeres de Chilcatotoras” communal bank.  She lives in the Chilcatotoras communal bank, part of the Tarqui parish in Cuenca.  This parish is known for its green pastures and inspirational landscapes. The people here maintain their traditions and culture. They raise livestock and farm.

Rosa is 43 years old, married and has six children, ages 22, 19, 17, 14, 11, and 7.  Her oldest son is married and lives on his own.  Two of her children work and help her financially; two attend high school; and one studies at the local school.

Rosa spends most of her time doing housework and caring for her children, but in order to help with the household finances she raises and sells Guinea pigs, chickens, pigs, and livestock.  She also farms and what she harvests is for personal consumption in her home. 

She will use the money from this loan to invest in Guinea pigs, chickens, and schoolbooks for her children.  Her dream is to have a stall in the market so she can sell her animals.

loans.use: to buy animals.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to make improvements to her home.

loans.name: Francisco Javier

texts.es: Francisco  vive en el cantón manta. Tiene 39 años. Es casado  Tiene dos hijos. el  Toma la decisión de buscar trabajo para seguir  con los estudios de sus hijos  y Como nadie le daba la oportunidad de trabajar en una empresa. El decide juntar dinero  para dar apertura  a su negocio que la venta de ladrillo En la actualidad su negocio poco a poco creció  hasta llegar a tener  una clientela francisco trabaja  todos los días diariamente. Con el préstamo comprara, tierra, caña, cemento y varios, etc. su meta es tener un camión para entregar los ladrillos y mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en: Francisco lives in the canton of Manta. He is 39 years old. He is married and has two children. He decided to look for work in order to continue his children's education and because how no one was giving him the opportunity to work for a company. He decided to raise money in order to open his business of selling bricks. Presently, his business grew little by little until the point of having a customer base. Francisco works every day. With this loan, he will buy dirt, rods, etc. His goal is to own a truck to deliver his bricks and to improve his home.

loans.use: to buy bricks, rods, etc.

loans.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es: María  vive en el cantón libertad. Tiene 30 años. Esta unida tiene dos  hijos .Ella  Toma la decisión de buscar trabajo para seguir con los estudios de  sus hijos. Como nadie le daba la oportunidad de trabajar en una empresa.  Decide juntar dinero  para dar apertura  a su negocio  de venta  de cosméticos. En la actualidad su negocio poco a poco creció  hasta llegar a tener  una clientela. Maria trabaja en su negocio sola  diariamente. Con el préstamo perfumes, cremas, desodorantes etc. Su meta es ampliar sus ventas de cosmeticos y tener una tienda en el futuro.
texts.en: María lives in the canton of Libertad. She is 30 years old. She is married and has two children. She made the decision to look for work in order to continue her children's education and because how no one was giving her the opportunity to work for a company. She decided to raise money in order to open her business of selling cosmetics. Presently, her business grew little by little until the point of having a customer base. Maria works alone in her store daily. Her dream is to expand her cosmetics sales and have a store in the future.

loans.use: to purchase perfumes, creams, deoderants

loans.name: Mujeres Solidarias Group

texts.es:
¡Saludos desde Perú! Este es el  grupo Mujeres Solidarias

La Sra. Aydee es la presidenta del grupo. Ella tiene 44 años vive junto a su pareja y sus 02 hijos, son 30 años que se dedica a la venta de verduras empezó su negocio sola, con el único fin de ayudar a sus hijos, su trabajo es muy sacrificado porque tiene que madrugar todos los días para ir en busca de verduras frescas,ella trabaja 13 horas diarias en un puesto que alquila en el mercado de su barrio, lo que más desea es tener su propio puesto de venta; así no tendría que pagar por el alquiler y podría tener más ingresos, el préstamo que ha solicitado lo utilizara para incrementar su negocio con la compra de mas verduras.
La Sra. Aydee esta agradecida por su préstamo, en la foto esta de pie y viste polo fuccia.
texts.en:
Greetings from Peru!  This is the Mujeres Solidarias group.  

Aydee is the president of the group.  She is 44 years old and lives together with her partner and their two children.  For more than 30 years she has worked selling vegetables.  She started her business alone in order to help her children.  She sacrifices for her work because she has to get up early every day to search for fresh vegetables.  She works 13 hours a day at a rented shop in the market in her neighborhood.  She would like to own her own shop so that she would not have to pay rent and would have more income.  

She plans to use this loan to expand her business with the purchase of more vegetables.  Aydee is grateful for the loan.  In the photo she is standing and wearing a fuchsia shirt.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables.

loans.name: Emprendedoras En Accion Group

texts.es:
¡Saludos desde Perú! Este es el  grupo Emprendedores en Accion

La Sra. Zoraida es una de las socias del grupo. Ella tiene 73 años es separada y tiene 02 hijos adultos cada uno con su familia respectiva. Hace 02 años inicio su negocio propio, una bodega donde vende productos de primera necesidad  para eso acondiciono un lugar en su casa donde tiene su negocio, lo hizo con el fin de solventar sus propios gastos y no tener que depender de sus hijos. La Sra. Zoraida también prepara algunos alimentos  para vender, esto lo hace los fines de semana y le permite otro ingreso adicional, Con el préstamo que ha solicitado desea comprar más productos para su bodega de esa manera tenerlo surtido para que sus ventas sean mejores, en el futuro desea seguir con su negocio porque se siente útil con muchas ganas de seguir trabajando.
A todos los inversionistas de kiva le quiere decir ¡Muchas gracias por apoyar a mi grupo comunal!

La Sra. Zoraida aparece en la foto con polo color amarillo
texts.en:
Greetings from Peru!  This is the Emprendedores en Accion communal bank.  Zoraida is one of the members of the group.  She is 73 years old and separated.  She has two adult children, and they each have their own family.

Two years ago she started her own business.  She has a grocery store where she sells basic needs items.  She set up a place in her house, which is where she has her business.  She did this so that she could pay her own expenses and not be dependent upon her children.  Zoraida also prepares some food items to sell on the week-ends, and this allows her to have additional income.

She wishes to use the requested loan to buy more products for her store.  This way she will have it stocked in order for sales to improve.  In the future she wishes to continue with her business because she feels useful and has a great desire to continue working.

She wants to tell all of the Kiva lenders, “Thank you very much for supporting my communal bank!”

Zoraida appears in the photo in a yellow polo style shirt.

loans.use: to buy basic needs products for her grocery store.

loans.name: Sol's Group

texts.en:
Sol is a resident of Moung Russey District in Cambodia's Battambang Province. She is 30 years old and married with a son who is still in school. To make a living, Sol and her husband have been farming rice on three hectares of farmland for ten years. Together, they can earn about 15,000 riels (KHR) per day and manage to save about 8,000 KHR each day after offsetting daily expenses.

This will be Sol's third loan request through Kiva's partner VisionFund. The previous loans helped her to successfully support her family. Now she is leading a group of two to take out a loan. Sol will use her portion of the loan to pay for labor fees for harvesting rice. She hopes to get a high yield from her farming business.

loans.use: To pay for labor fees for harvesting rice

loans.name: Almaz

texts.en:
Almaz is 63 years old. He lives in the small village of Bolnisi district with his wife, son, and daughter-in-law. The family runs an agricultural business. In particular, they have a milk cow, whose milk is used in dairy products. Besides this, they have a plot of agricultural land where tomatoes and potatoes are grown. 

Almaz sells the harvested products and dairy products locally in an open market at a good price. He is very hard working man and has a rich experience in his business. Almaz requested a loan for purchasing a milk cow. After purchasing another milk cow, he will be able to expand the cattle and produce more dairy products. This will increase the income of the family. With increased income they will be able to improve their living conditions. 

Almaz awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase milk cows.

loans.name: Mohand Group

texts.en:
Mohand is a seven-member group. All of them are poor ladies from Taiz, Yemen. 

They applied for a 140,000 YER loan from AMB to renovate their houses.

Anesah  is a 49-year-old married woman who has some children. She is the leader of the group. She is uneducated and living in a poor area in Taiz. Her house is very old and in a miserable situation. The house is vulnerable to fall down at any time. 

It is known that house renovation requires a lot of money. She has started renovating her house but now she is in short of money. She needs to complete the renovation task, so she asked for a loan of 20,000 YER to buy cement and bricks. She hopes that after the completion of house renovation, she will start accumulating money to improve the life conditions of her family and open a saving account.

loans.use: to buy cement and bricks to use for construction.

loans.name: Hoa

texts.en: Hoa was born in 1981. She has two children who are studying in primary school. Her husband is a carpenter. Hoa provides carpentry services and raises pigs to earn a living. Her income is about 6,000,000 VND per month. Her family’s total earnings are about 16,000,000 VND per month. She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2008. In the last cycle she borrowed 9,632,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 10,080,000 VND to buy wood for her carpentry workshop. She wants to be able to raise her children well.

loans.use: to buy wood for her carpentry workshop.

loans.name: Al-Fateh Group

texts.en: Al-Fateh is a seven-member group. All of them are poor ladies from Taiz, Yemen. They applied for a 140,000 YER loan from AMB to renovate their house. Fathia is a 43-year-old married woman and has four children. She is the leader of the group. She is uneducated, living in a poor area in Taiz. Her house is very old and in a miserable situation. She has accumulated some money to renovate her house. It is known that house renovation requires a lot of money. She has started renovating her house, but now she is short of money. She needs to complete the renovation task, so she asked for a loan of 20,000 YER to buy cement and carpentry materials. She hopes that after the completion of the house renovation, she can start accumulating money to improve living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to buy cement and carpentry materials for construction

loans.name: Mirtha Gissela

texts.es:
Mirtha es un mujer muy trabajadora, la cual ha pasado por muchos inconvenientes pero ello no ha hecho que pierda las esperanzas ni las ganas de vivir, ya que es madre de un pequeño de 8 años por el cual cada día hace lo posible he imposible por brindarle su cariño y sobre todo poder otorgarle una vida mejor. La vivienda de Mirtha se encuentra en el distrito de Santiago, en el cual se encuentran varios fundos agroexportadores, en uno de los cuales trabaja Mirtha como obrera. Mirtha trabaja alrededor de 9 horas al dia y con el fruto de su trabajo puede solventar con mucho esfuerzo los gastos de su hogar; ella cree que está saliendo adelante en su trabajo porque es responsable y porque tiene la mayor motivación para salir adelante, el cual es su hijo.

Mirtha está muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá construir una habitación de material noble (ladrillo, cemento), para su hijos ya que actualmente es de adobe (ladrillos de barro); de esta manera podrá brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y luchar por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una profesión a su hijo”.
texts.en:
Mirtha is a hardworking woman who has had many inconveniences but it has not caused her to lose hope or a desire to keep living because she is the mother of an eight year old boy and every day she does whatever she can to provide him with love and above all a better life. Mirtha’s house is located in the Santiago district, where there are several agro exporter farms and Mitha works at one as a laborer. She works about nine hours per day and is able to pay the household expenses through the fruits of her labor, getting ahead through her work and because she is responsible and have a great motivation to get ahead, her son.
 
Mirtha is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to them she will be able to build a house our of solid materials (bricks, cement) for her children. Her current home is made of adobe (mud bricks) and in this way she can provide a better quality of life for her family and made her greatest dream come true, “Give a profession to her son.”

loans.use: to make home improvements.

loans.name: Nadhira

texts.en:
Nadhira is 47-year-old married woman with children. 

Although she is uneducated, she runs a grocery store. She began her business seven years ago. She started by selling boiled potatoes and eggs in the streets. She really worked hard under the sun and rain. She earned a modest profit and opened a small grocery. This was a very good step in her business. Year by year, she accumulated a good amount of money and opened a larger grocery store. 

She applied for a 100,000 YER loan to buy new products for her grocery. In future, she hopes to see her children marry and open another grocery in a different quarter.

loans.use: to buy new products for her grocery.

loans.name: Alex Paul

texts.es:
En la cálida y acogedora ciudad de Camaná vive Alex, un hombre muy trabajador y sobre todo con una alegría contagiante. Desde muy pequeño trabajaba en cualquier oficio pequeño que s ele presentara ya que sus padres tenían pocos recursos económicos y tenía la necesidad de apoyarlos, es por ello que solo tuvo estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar la carrera de ingeniería Civil.

Con cada amanecer Alex trabaja como obrero agrícola, el labora alrededor de 9 horas al día y con el fruto de su trabajo apoya a sus padres con los gastos del hogar; el cree que está saliendo adelante en su trabajo porque es responsable y sobre todo honrado en su trabajo.

Alex está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar mejoras en la vivienda de sus padres, ya que podrá mejorar el techo de la vivienda y poder ya que debido a las lluvias en algunos casos se producen inundaciones, de esta manera el podrá darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” construir su vivienda de material noble”.
texts.en:
Alex lives in the warm and welcoming city of Camaná.  He is a hardworking man and above all has a contagious happiness.  He has been working in whatever small business opportunity he had since his youth, since his parents only had limited resources and he had to help support them.  It’s for this reason that he was only able to complete middle school, but he would have liked to study civil engineering.

Each morning he works as a field hand and works about nine hours per day and helps his parents with the household expenses through the fruits of his labor.  He believes that he is getting ahead because he is responsible and above all he is honest.

Alex is grateful to the Kiva lenders who have made it possible for him to make improvements to his parents’ house.  He can improve the roof because the rain sometimes causes floods.  In this way he can provide a better quality of life to her family and continue working to be able to achieve his greatest dream, “to build a home out of solid materials.”

loans.use: to make home improvements.

loans.name: Petronila

texts.es:
Petronila es una mujer de 53 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica con su esposo, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar para solventar sus gastos, Petronila no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta cocinar deliciosos postres y en lagunas ocasiones prepara unos riquísimos Tallarines Rojos para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Petronila trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de comida, ella ocupa un pequeño espacio en su vivienda para brindar sus servicios, Petronila trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 8 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien pro su buena sazón y por el trato amable que ofrece a sus clientes.
Petronila se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que desea hacer el techado y la ampliación de su cocina, de esta manera Petronila brindara mayor seguridad y bienestar para su familia y clientes, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener un gran restaurante.
texts.en:
Petronila is 53 years old and lives with her husband in the city of Ica.  She is a very friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic person with a great desire to succeed.  Unfortunately because of a lack of financial resources and the need to go to work to pay her expenses, she was not able to study for a professional career, but she would have liked to have done so.  She likes to cook delicious desserts in her spare time and on some occasions prepares dome delicious red noodles to share with her family.
 
On her own initiative and with much dedication and effort, Petronila Works in a small food business.  She had a small space set up in her home where she can serve customers.  Petronia works every day from early morning and works about eight hours.  She is comfortable with this work and believes that things are going well for her because her delicious seasonings and the good service she gives to her customers.
 
Petronila is very grateful to the Kiva lenders and thanks to their help she can improve her home.  She wants to build the roof and expand her kitchen so that she can provide more security and wellbeing to her family and customers.  She will continue working and making an effort to achieve her greatest dream of having a great restaurant.

loans.use: to make improvements to her home.

loans.name: Mon's Group

texts.en:
Mon, 42, is a married mother of five children residing in a rural village of Battambang province’s Ek Phnom district, Cambodia. Out of her five children, she still has one child in school. To make a living, she has been selling fish while her husband catches fish. 

This is a group loan for Mon’s group of two members who live in the same village. Mon is in her fourth loan cycle with VisionFund. She successfully used the past loans to relieve her family's economic burden and improve her livelihood. Mon and the other member are applying for a loan of KHR 1,000,000 each. Mon, the leader, is going to use her portion to buy fish to resell. She hopes this loan will enable her to earn more income from her current business so as to improve her standard of living and keep her child in school.

loans.use: To buy fish for resale

loans.name: Ai's Group

texts.en:
Ai was born in 1979. She has three children. Her daughter is learning in the first grade. Two others are under three years old. Her husband is a worker. 

Ai is a worker who raises ducks for an employer. She earns 3,000,000 VND a month. Her family’s total earnings are about 7,000,000 VND per month.
 
She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2012. In the last cycle she borrowed 5,152,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 4,256,000 VND to buy ducks and food to raise them by herself. Her dream is can let her children have good careers.

Other members who are part of Ai's group include the following: 
Xuan was born in 1964. She has two children. She wants to borrow 5,600,000 VND to raise pigs. 
Nam was born in 1953. She has three children. She raises pigs to earn a living. She wants to borrow 5,600,000 VND to raise pigs for selling.
Bao was born in 1962. She has two children. She raises pigs to earn a living. She wants to borrow 5,152,000 VND to raise pigs for selling.
Lan was born in 1956. She has two children. She raises pigs to earn a living. She wants to borrow 5,152,000 VND to raise pigs for selling.

loans.use: to buy ducks and food to raise them herself.

loans.name: Sandra Jamileth

texts.es:
La Señora Sandra es una persona muy responsable, honesta y trabajadora, es madre  soltera  y tiene  5 hijos, vive en una comunidad de Choluteca, al sur de Honduras. 
Doña Sandra su negocio es compra y venta  de gallinas. El préstamo lo necesita para la compra de gallinas. Con el préstamo espera tener más producto que ofrecer a sus clientes y cubrir la demanda  de los  mismos. 
Doña Sandra su negocio está ubicado en una  zona  muy  comercial y eso representa una ventaja para su negocio,  con los ingresos obtenidos espera mejorar un poco su situación económica y la de su familia.
Doña Sandra en el futuro espera que su negocio sea  el más  grande de la  zona. y sueña con ver a sus hijos convertidos en persona de bien y con mejores oportunidades  para la  sociedad.



Choluteca, Honduras –  Enero  del  2013
texts.en:
Ms. Sandra is a very responsible, honest and hard-working person. She is a single mother of five children, and she lives in the region of Choluteca, in the south of Honduras.

Ms. Sandra's business involves the buying and selling of chickens. She needs the loan to buy chickens. With the loan she hopes to have more products to offer to, and meet the demand of, her customers.

Her business is located in a very commercial zone, which is an advantage for her business. With the income she could receive, she hopes to improve a little her family's economic situation. 

One day she hopes that her business will be the biggest in the area, and she dreams of seeing her children grow up to be good people with better opportunities within society.

Choluteca, Honduras –  January 2013

loans.use: to buy chickens for her business.

loans.name: Amanda

texts.es:
La señora Amanda  de 42 años de edad, es casada, tiene dos  hijos  que dependen de ella , sus hijos tiene edades de 18 y 17 años, vive en una  comunidad de San Lorenzo, al sur de Honduras, tiene casa propia  y se dedica desde hace 02  años  a la venta de frescos, churros, embutidos, granos básicos, y abarrotería en general.
Doña Amanda  sus clientes le prefieren por su atención y dispocion en el momento de servirles, sus ventas son de lunes a domingo y la mayoría de sus clientes son los empleados de una finca que está ubicada en su comunidad,.
Doña Amanda es una mujer trabajadora y con deseos de salir adelante, está solicitando el préstamo para la  compra de frescos, pollo, embutidos, frijoles, azúcar, café, arroz, salsas, pastas, sal, manteca, etc.  Que son los productos que más se venden.
Doña Amanda con el   apoyo de este préstamo  pretende mejorar sus ingresos y de esta manera mejorar su calidad de vida, su sueño es mejorar su negocio.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Enero del 2013.
texts.en:
Amanda, 42, is married with two dependent children, aged 17 and 18. She lives in San Lorenzo, to the south of Honduras and has her own home. For two years she has been selling fresh goods, churros, sausages, basic grains and general groceries.

Amanda's customers like her because of her care and manner when she is serving them. Her shop is open Monday - Sunday and the majority of her customers work on the farm located in her area.

Amanda is a hard-working woman, who wants to succeed. She is requesting the loan to buy groceries, chicken, sausages, beans, sugar, coffee, rice, sauces, pasta, salt and butter etc., which are her best-selling products.

With the help of this loan, Amanda will try to improve her income and therefore improve her quality of life. Her dream is to improve her business.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - January 2013.

loans.use: to buy groceries, chicken, sausages, beans, sugar, coffee, rice, sauces, pasta, salt and butter etc for her business.

loans.name: Yamili Zamir

texts.es:
Yamali  tiene 28 años de edad, ella vive en Ica, Perú. Ica ciudad cálida y acogedora, en la cual podemos encontrar muchos atractivos turísticos como “La Laguna de Huacachina”. Yamali es una joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante, es por ello que con mucho esfuerzo logro estudiar la carrera de educación inicial y gracias a ello pudo tener un empleo en un colegio de su ciudad, en el cual labora actualmente; ella trabaja alrededor de 8 horas al día y con el fruto de su trabajo puede apoyar a sus padres con los gastos del hogar; ella cree está saliendo adelante en su trabajo porque es muy carismática con los niños y sobre todo tiene mucha paciencia.

Yamali está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que con la ayuda brindada podrá realizar mejoras en su vivienda, ya que esta es de adobe, ya que realizar un reforzamiento de paredes con material noble y con esta mejora  podrá ayudarle a va tener una mejor calidad de vida y sobre todo poder brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y seguir luchando para lograr hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener una maestría en educación”.
texts.en:
Yamali, 28, lives in Ica, Peru. Ica is a warm and welcoming city, which has many tourist attractions like "The Huacachina Lagoon". Yamali is a young woman eager to get ahead, which is how, with a lot of effort, she was able to get a degree in primary education. As a result, she was able to get a job at a school in her city, where she currently works. She works around 8 hours a day and the fruit of her labor, she is able to help her parents with household expenses. She believes she is doing well at work because she is very charismatic with the children, and above all, she is very patient.

Yamali is very grateful to Kiva lenders because with their help, she can make improvements to her home, which is made of adobe. She will reinforce the walls with good-quality material and with this improvement she will be able to have a better quality of life and above all, give her family a better quality of life and keep striving to realize her dream of having a master's degree in education.

loans.use: for home improvements.

loans.name: Maricela De Jesus

texts.es:
La Señora Maricela es una muy buena persona honesta, responsable y trabajadora vive con  sus 6 hijos en un caserío  al sur de Honduras. Su negocio es la  compra y venta  de  ganado. 
Doña Maricela  el préstamo lo necesita para la compra  vacas y cerdos con el préstamo espera  que sus ventas aumenten debido a que contara con capital  fresco para ofrecer a sus clientes.
Doña Maricela con esta inversión espera cubrir sus necesidades, así mismo desea que su situación de  vida y la su familia mejore con esta inversión. 
Doña Maricela  sueña que  en 2 años  su negocio este posicionado como  el negocio   más grande y  conocido de su caserío   y poder seguir apoyando a  sus hijos  a que se conviertan en personas de bien.



Choluteca, Honduras – Enero  del   2013
texts.en:
Maricela is a very good person.  She is honest, responsible, hard-working, and lives with her six children in a very small village in southern Honduras.  Her business is buying and selling livestock.  

Maricela needs the loan to buy cows and pigs.  With the loan, she hopes that her sales will grow since she can provide fresh product to her clients.  

With this investment, Maricela hopes to cover her necessities,  She also hopes that her life situation and that of her family will improve with this investment.  Maricela dreams that in two years, her business will be larger and better-known in her small village, and that she will be able to continue to support her children in becoming good people.

Choluteca, Honduras (January 2013)

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Mery Daza

texts.es:
Mery es una joven de 28 años de edad, vive en la calurosa y alegre ciudad de Pucallpa.  Mery  es una joven muy alegre y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, ya que es madre de un pequeño de 7 años de edad por el cual ella lucha cada día para poder brindarle lo mejor, es por ello día a día Mery trabaja en un centro médico de su ciudad, ya que es enfermera,  ella labora alrededor de 8 horas al día y en su vivienda tiene un pequeño negocio de bazar, con el cual tiene un dinero extra ante cualquier emergencia, con el fruto de su trabajo puede solventar con mucho esfuerzo los gastos del hogar; ella cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy responsable y tiene mucha paciencia.

Mery está muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería para su pequeño negocio de bazar como ropa, zapatos, adornos para el hogar, entre otros, así podrá tener variedad de productos y poder mejorar sus ingresos para así seguir luchando por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:”  Tener una casa propia y darle una buena educación a su hijo”.
texts.en:
Mery is a young, twenty-eight-year-old woman.  She lives in the warm and happy city of Pucallpa.  She is a happy young woman with a lot of drive to continue moving forward.  She is already a mother to a young seven-year-old boy.  It is for him that she fights each day in order to offer him the best; it is for him that Mery works in a medical center in the city.  She is a nurse and works about eight hours a day.  

In her home, she also has a small bazaar, where she generates extra income for whatever emergency may arise.  With the fruit of her work, she is able to cover her home expenses with a lot of effort.  She believes that everything is going well because she is very responsible and patient.

Mery is very thankful for the loaners at Kiva.  Thanks to the help that they have offered her, she will be able to buy merchandise for her small bazaar business, like clothing, shoes, home decorations, and other items.  She will be able to have a variety of products and can increase her income in order to continue fighting to make her biggest dream come true: to have her own house and to be able to give her son a good education.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (clothing, shoes, and other items).

loans.name: Ricardo Sneider

texts.es:
Ricardo es un joven muy trabajador y entusiasta, vive en la ciudad de Camana, la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura, en especialmente se cultiva el arroz, frejoles, entre otros. Debido a sus pocos recursos económicos Ricardo solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de educación secundaria, pero le hubiera gustado poder estudiar en la universidad.

Cada día Ricardo trabaja como repartidor en una pequeña empresa de distribución de bebidas gaseosas, el trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día y con el fruto de su trabajo apoya a su madre con los gastos del hogar; el cree que está saliendo adelante en su trabajo porque es muy responsable y honrado.

Ricardo está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar una pequeña vivienda, ya que actualmente está viviendo en una casa alquilada, de esta manera podrá ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y poder seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener un negocio propio y ser un prospero comerciante”.
texts.en:
Ricardo is young, enthusiastic, and hard working.  He lives in the city of Camana, known for having a warm and welcoming climate.  There is much agriculture here, especially rice, beans, and other things.  Because of his low financial resources, Ricardo was only able to study to middle school, but he would have liked to have attended university.

Each day Ricardo works as a delivery man for a small soft drink company.  He works about 10 hours per day and supports his parents with the fruits of his labor.  He believes that things are going well for him because he is responsible and honest.

Ricardo is grateful to the Kiva lenders who have made it possible for him to buy a small house, because he is living in a rented home.  In this way he can improve his family’s quality of life and continue working to be able to achieve his greatest dream, “to have his own business and become a prosperous merchant.”

loans.use: to buy a home.

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es:
El Señor Wilfredo es una persona muy responsable, honesta y trabajadora,   vive  con  su  esposa  y sus 5 hijos en una comunidad de Choluteca al sur de Honduras.  Sus  ingresos  son los que  percibe por  su trabajo  como trabajo permanente en una  camaronera de la zona. 
Don Wilfredo el préstamo lo necesita para la compra de material  como cemento lamina  de cinc, arena, grava, ladrillos y clavos.  Para hacer unas mejoras a su casa en la pila,  baño y servicio sanitario.  Con esto espera  mejorar un poco su calidad  de vida y la de su familia.
Don Wilfredo vive  en una  zona muy  agro industrial. En el futuro espera seguir mejorando su vivienda, gracias a la inversión hecha y a las que haga en la misma.
Don Wilfredo sueña con ver a sus hijos  convertirlo en persona de bien y con mejores oportunidades  para la  vida.




Choluteca, Honduras –  Enero  del  2013
texts.en:
Mr. Wilfredo is a very responsible, honest and hard-working person. He lives with his wife and five children in the region of Choluteca in the south of Honduras. He makes a living through his permanent position in a local shrimping company. 

He needs the loan to buy materials such as cement, sheets of corrugated tin roofing, sand, gravel, bricks and nails to make some improvements in his house, such as in the laundry-washing sink, the bathroom and sewage in general. With these changes he hopes to improve his and his family's quality of life.

Mr. Wilfredo lives in an agriculturally intense zone. In the future he hopes to continue making improvements on his home, thanks to the investments that he has made and that he would like to make in the future.

He dreams of watching his children grow up to be good people and with better opportunities in life.

Choluteca, Honduras –  January  2013

loans.use: to buy cement, sheets of corrugated tin roofing, sand, gravel, bricks and nails for his house.

loans.name: Ana Mercedes

texts.es:
La Señora  Mercedes  es una persona responsable, trabajadora y honesta, vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos en una comunidad al sur de Honduras. Su negocio es la  compra y venta  de   cerdos. 
Doña Mercedes el préstamo lo necesita para la compra de cerdos. Con el préstamo ella espera que las ventas de su negocio aumenten y ofrecer a sus clientes lo mejor cubriendo así  sus necesidades y con esto mejorar un poco su situación  económica y la de su  familia.
Doña Mercedes en unos años espera que su negocio siga  creciendo y  consolidándose  para que se convierta en el más reconocido de la zona y seguir apoyando a su familia para que sus hijos terminen sus estudios y se conviertan en personas honestas  y de bien.



Choluteca, Honduras –  Enero  del   2013
texts.en:
Mercedes is a very responsible, hardworking, and honest person.  She lives with her husband and three children in a south Honduras community.

Mercedes needs this loan to buy pigs.  She expects to increase her sales and offer her customers better selections and in this way improve her financial situation a bit.

Mercedes expects her business to continue growing and consolidating her business so that it becomes the best known in the zone so she can continue supporting her family so that her children can finish their studies and become honest people of means.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Dallanna Geraldine

texts.es:
En la cálida ciudad de de Ica rodeada por las maravillosas dunas y sobre todo en la cual podemos encontrar la “laguna de Huacachina”, en esta ciudad vive Dallana, quien es una joven con una alegría contagiante y sobre todo tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante, ya que para ella es importante. Dallana trabaja desde muy joven ya que sus padres tenían pocos recursos económicos y por ello tuvo la necesidad de tener un empleo a corta edad, debido a ello solo pudo estudiar hasta el nivel secundario, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar una carrera universitaria.

Día a día Dallana trabaja en un cibercafé, ella labora alrededor de 8 horas al día y se encarga de atender a los clientes que frecuentan el local, asimismo tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de ropa y ofrece sus productos a sus vecinos de su barrio; ella cree que está saliendo adelante porque es responsable y sobre todo honrada.

Dallana está muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá  comprar mercadería como polos, camisas, pantalones, entre otros, de esta manera ella podrá tener mayor variedad de productos y poder mejorar sus ingresos y seguir luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Dallana lives in the city of Ica, which is warm, surrounded by wonderful sand dunes and near the Oasis of Huacachina.  She is young, with a contagious happiness and a strong desire to get ahead, which she says is very important to her.

Dallana had to work a job from a very early age because her parents had few economic resources.  For this reason she was able to study only through secondary school, but she would have liked to go to university.

Dallana works daily in a cybercafé, where she works around eight hours each day and is in charge of waiting on the customers.  At the same time she has a small business selling clothing to the people in her neighborhood.  She believes she is getting ahead because she is responsible and above all honest.

Dallana is very grateful to Kiva lenders because it is thanks to their help that she will be able to buy merchandise such as shirts, polo shirts and pants, among others.  In this way she will be able to offer a greater variety of products and increase her income, while at the same time continuing to work everyday to make her greatest dream a reality:  to have her own home.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as shirts, polo shirts and pants, among others.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.es:
La señora Cecilia de 43  años de edad, es casada, tiene dos hijos  que dependen de ella, sus hijos tiene edades de 20 y 21 años, vive en la comunidad de San Lorenzo, al sur de Honduras, tiene casa propia  y se dedica desde hace 15  años  a la venta de golosinas, pan y comidas, sus clientes son los amigos y vecinos.
Doña Cecilia es una mujer trabajadora con muchos deseos de salir adelante.
Doña Cecilia está solicitando el préstamo para la  compra de cemento, arena, grava y ladrillos para terminar dos cuartos que está construyendo y otra parte del dinero la invertirá en su negocio comprara papas, cebolla, chile verde, cilantro, harina y cuajada que son la materia prima que usa para la elaboración de  sus golosinas. 
Doña Cecilia con el apoyo de este préstamo pretende mejorar sus ingresos y de esta manera mejorar un poco su calidad de vida, su sueño es mejorar su negocio.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Enero del 2013.
texts.en:
Cecilia, 43, is married and has two dependent children aged 20 and 21. She lives in San Lorenzo, south of Honduras and has her own home. For 15 years she has sold snacks, bread and meals - her customers are her friends and neighbours.

Cecilia is a hard-working woman with a strong desire to succeed. 

Cecilia is requesting the loan to buy cement, sand, gravel and bricks to finish the two rooms she is building and the other part of the money is to invest in her business to buy potatoes, onion, green chillies, coriander, flour and curd, which are the raw materials used to make her snacks.

With the help of this loan, Cecilia will try to improve her income and slightly improve her quality of life. Her dream is to improve her business.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - January 2013.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, bricks, potatoes, onion, green chillies, coriander, flour and curd for her home and business.

loans.name: 31-Nueva Colcapirhua Group

texts.es: El Banco de emprendimiento 31-NUEVA COLCAPIRHUA está  compuesto por nueve integrantes siete mujeres y dos varones,  la presidenta del  banco es la Sra. Julia tiene 64 años, en la foto es la Sra. de sombrero blanco y chompa celeste. ella  tiene un hijo mayor ya independiente, ella se dedica a la venta de variedad de licores, como chicha y cerveza en su local que se encuentra en la zona de Colcapirhua,  este préstamo es su sexta secuencia ella ya es cliente antigua de la institución, solicita el crédito para la compra  de material de construcción ya que quiere hacer refaccionar y ampliar su local  y así poder brindar mayor comodidad a su clientela y  de esta manera tambien mejorar y crecer en su negocio y brindar variedad de productos a sus clientes,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es seguir mejorando en su  negocio. La Sra. Julia  es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad brindada.
texts.en: The 31-NUEVA COLCAPIRHUA communal bank has nine members: seven women and two men. The bank’s president is Julia. She is 64 years old. In this photo, she is the woman with the white hat and the blue sweater. She has one older, independent son. Julia has a business selling a variety of liquors like Chicha, a corn liquor, and beer in the Colcapirhua area. This loan is her sixth cycle since she is one of the institution’s older customers. She is requesting a loan to purchase construction supplies because she wants to repair and expand her business. She also wants offer a variety of products to her customers. Her reason for requesting this loan is in order to continue improving her business. Julia is a very hard working person who is happy about the offered opportunities.

loans.use: purchase construction materials in order to repair her business

loans.name: Juan Romulo

texts.es:
Juan tiene 61 años de edad pero tiene la alegría de un joven de 20 años. Su vivienda se encuentra en la ciudad de Pisco, la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo posee playas hermosas y sus pobladores son personas alegres. El es padre de 2 hijos de 24 y 16 años, a quienes ha sacado adelante ya que es padre soltero, pero por ellos el daría la vida. Juan es muy trabajador y es por ello que con cada amanecer el trabaja en su pequeño negocio como estibador, trabajo que desempeña al lado de su triciclo con el cual puede transportar la carga, Juan trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 20 clientes diariamente; el cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es amable con los clientes y siempre esta dispuesto a trabajar.

Juan está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá renovar su fiel herramienta de trabajo el cual es su triciclo ya que podrá brindarle mantenimiento a los frenos, los rayos, comprar llantas nuevas, cámaras de llanta, entre otros y con ello poder tener seguridad al momento de transportar la carga y poder mejorar sus ingresos, así el seguirá luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Terminar de construir su vivienda y tener un negocio de venta de repuestos de motos”.
texts.en: Juan is 61 but feels as jovial as a 21-year-old. He lives in the city of Pisco, which boasts a warm and welcoming climate, beautiful beaches, and cheerful inhabitants. He has two sons aged 24 and 16, whom he has raised on his own as a single dad. He would give his life for them. Juan is very hard-working: every morning at dawn he starts his work as a transporter of goods, thanks to his trusty tricycle cart. He works around ten hours a day and sometimes tends to as many as 20 customers a day. He attributes his business's success to his amiability towards customers and his readiness to work. He is very grateful to Kiva lenders, since, thanks to their help, he will be able to renovate his beloved tricycle cart by performing maintenance on the brakes and the spokes, and buying new tires and inner tubes. This will make his transportation business that much safer, and Juan will able to carry loads without worrying and improve his income. This will help him to keep fighting every day to make his greatest dream come true: "I want to finish building my house and have a motorcycle parts shop".

loans.use: to perform maintenance on his tricycle cart.

loans.name: José Plinio

texts.es:
Don José tiene 54 años de edad, es casado y tiene seis hijos de los cuales cuatro viven con él; vivian tres con él pero ha venido uno del extranjero. Él tiene varios años de ser promotor de salud y a la vez agricultor aunque en esta actividad tiene más tiempo de desarrollarla, siembra maíz, maicillo, frijol y se dedica a cuidar ganado. Para comprar los productos él camina unos 800 metros por una calle balastreada, pasa por un riachuelo, sube una cuesta hasta llegar al lugar en donde aborda el autobús que tarda unos treinta y cinco minutos.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para limpiar los terrenos donde pasta el ganado, reparara cercos, comprara útiles escolares a sus hijos y algunos electrodomésticos. El dinero será de gran ayuda a sus hijos, porque así asistirán a la escuela y no perderán las clases y sus animales tendrán buen pasto. Su deseo es construir una mejor casa para sus hijos.
texts.en:
José is 54 years old, married, and has six children, four of whom are living with him.  Three of his children used to live with him, but one more is now living with him after living abroad.  He has worked for many years as a "promotor de salud" [healthcare work, but role isn't clear] at the same time as working in agriculture, although he has worked in agriculture longer - sowing corn, sorghum, beans, and raising cattle. To buy the products he needs, José walks 800 m along an unpaved road, across a stream, and up a hill to arrive at the bus stop where he takes the bus for 35 minutes. 

The loan that he is requesting from Fundación Campo, is to clean up his land where the cattle graze, to repair fences, to buy school supplies for his children, and to buy some household appliances. The money will be of great help to his children, so that they can go to school and not miss classes, and so that his animals have good grass to graze on. his dream is to build a better house for his children.

loans.use: to clean up the land where the cattle graze, repair fences, buy school supplies for his children, and buy some household appliances.

loans.name: Ana Adilia

texts.es: La señora Ana Adilia habita en el municipio de Ticuantepe junto a su esposo e hijos, el alabora para una casa privada y ella es domestica, entre los dos se dividen los gastos del hogar, su mayor sueño es tener su casa bien acondicionada y que darle mejores condiciones a sus hijos, con este nuevo credito comprara materiales de construccion para construir un cuarto para cocina ya que actualmente esta en una caseta hecha de palmas de coco. Agradece el apoyo que Afodenic y Fondos Kiva le  han brindado.
texts.en:
Ana Adilia lives in the municipality of Ticuantepe with her husband and children.  Her husband works in a private house and she works as a domestic.  Between the two of them they split the household expenses.  Her greatest dream is to have her home well equipped in order to give better living conditions to her children.

With this new loan she will buy construction materials to build a room for the kitchen, which at the moment is in a hut made of coconut palms.  Ana Adilia is grateful for the support that AFODENIC and Kiva have given her.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Faustino Gregorio

texts.es: El señor Faustino habita en el municipio de Ticuantepe en el barrio Pablo Calero, casado parde de 4 hijos, ella le ayuda con los tareas del hogar, el es agricultor desde hace mas de 20 años, actualmente requiere de capital para darle  un optimo mantenimiento a su cultivo de Piña del cual requiere de fertilizantes e insumos necesarios para que su cultivo sea de calidad , con este nuevo financiamiento podra comprar los insumos, Agradece el apoyo que Afodenic en conjunto a Fondos Kiva.
texts.en: Faustino lives in the Pablo Calero neigbourhood of the town of Ticuantepe. He is married and has four sons. His wife helps him with household chores. A farmer for over twenty years, Faustino needs money to keep his pineapple crops in good condition, for which he needs fertiliser and other supplies. The loan will enable him to buy these, which are necessary to guarantee the quality of his product. He thanks field partner Afodenic and Kiva for their support.

loans.use: to keep his crops in good condition.

loans.name: Alirio De Jesús

texts.es:
Alirio de 45 años de edad, es un campesino de la vereda el algarrobo, lugar en donde vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos, dedicado a laborar al jornal, actividad inestable que en ocasiones no le genera el sustento diario. Por esta razón tomó la determinación de montar en su vivienda una tienda con el fin de ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Desea poder incrementar sus ventas para brindarle a su hijo mayor la oportunidad de radicarse en la ciudad e ingresar a la universidad. 
Su mayor sueño es poder consolidar su negocio y ofrecer todo tipo de productos con el propósito de satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes. Por esta razón se encuentra solicitando un crédito con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de productos de la canasta familiar y licor.
texts.en: Alirio is 45 and lives in El Algarrobo with his wife and their three children. A farmer by trade, he works as a day labourer, which is an unreliable source of income. This is why he chose to set up a general store at his house in order to improve his family's quality of life. He wants to increase his sales so as to help his oldest son move to the city and attend university. Alirio's greatest dream is to improve his business by offering a wider range of products for sale, in order to correctly answer customer demand. Thus, he asks for this loan in order to buy basic household goods and alcohol to sell.

loans.use: to buy basic houshehold goods and alcohol to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy trousers, shirts, and blouses.

loans.name: Albeiro De Jesús

texts.es:
Albeiro de 48 años de edad, es un hombre al que la ha tocado atravesar por innumerables situaciones que le han enseñado a ser más fuerte y siempre fijar sus ojos en grandes metas. Hace 5 años tuvo problemas de alcoholismo, situación que lo dejó al borde de  la quiebra y a punto de perder su familia, consiente de su estado decidió buscar ayuda profesional y reconstruir su hogar. Gracias al apoyo que le brindó su familia, Albeiro es un hombre nuevo lleno de ilusiones y ganas de laborar para ofrecerles a su esposa y a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida. Por esta razón decidió montar una legumbrería en el municipio de Amagá, la cual atiende diariamente de 5:30 de la mañana a 6:30 de la tarde.

Su mayor deseo es poder surtir su negocio para satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes, por esta razón se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de frutas y hortalizas, que le permitirán incrementar sus ventas y generar mayores ingresos para el sostenimiento de su hogar.
texts.en:
Albeiro is 48 years old. He is a man who has gone through innumerable experiences which have taught him to be stronger and to always set his sights on greater goals. Five years ago he had problems with alcoholism - a situation that left him almost broke and close to losing his family. Aware of his problem, he decided to seek professional help and rebuild his home. Thanks to the support of his family, Albeiro is a new man full of hopes and a drive to work hard to offer his wife and son a better quality of life. 

For this reason, he set up a fruit and vegetable store in the Amagá municipality, where he works every day from 5:30 a.m. to 6:30 p.m. His greatest dream is to be able to buy stock for his business, so that he can meet the needs of his customers, and this is why he is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of fruits and vegetables. This will enable him to increase his sales and generate more income for his household.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables for his store.

loans.name: Encarnacion

texts.es: La Sra. Encarnación tiene 48 años,  se dedica  a la confección de guantes para cocina desde hace ya varios años que ella confecciona estos guantes en su taller que se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio que es en la zona de Pampahasi,  Este préstamo es su  Primera secuencia dentro de la institución, La Sra. Encarnación va a utilizar este préstamo para la  compra una maquina recta a medio uso y de telas para la confección sus guantes  por mayor, Su razón para solicitar este préstamo es para incremento de capital de inversión. La Sra. Encarnación enfrenta retos en su negocio que son aumentar sus ingresos y va a utilizar los beneficios invirtiendo en la compra de materiales para la confección de guantes, ella ofrece sus productos en distintas ferias ya hace a pedido ya que estos guantes son muy útiles para sacar las bandejas del horno como también para levantar ollas muy calientes  La Sra. Encarnación es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Encarnación, 48, has been sewing oven gloves for a living for several years. She sews the gloves in her workshop, which is located in her home, in the Pampahasi area. 

This loan is her first cycle with the institution. Encarnación will use the loan to buy a sewing machine and fabrics to make into gloves for the wholesale market. 

Her motivation for requesting the loan is to increase her investment capital. Encarnación faces challenges in her business, which are to increase her income and use her profits to invest them in materials for sewing gloves. She sells her products at market and makes them to order. Her gloves are very useful for taking hot trays out of the oven and lifting very hot pots.

Encarnación is a very hard-working person and feels happy and grateful to the institution for the support is has offered.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and raw materials for her business.

loans.name: Tierra Fértil  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Tierra Fértil está formado por 7 socias que en su maytoría son familiares, trabajan diariamente en diferentes actividades laborales, las misma que les permiten aportar a la economía de sus hogares y sacar adelante a sus familias, son personas amables, gentiles y de un gran carisma que aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos. Viven por el sector de Cochapamba que pertenece a la parroquia del Valle en Cuenca, parroquia que ha tenido un gran crecimiento comercial, su arquitectura es una mezcla de lo antiguo y lo moderno. 

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Mónica, es socia del banco comunal Tierra Fértil desde hace 2 años, le gusta estar en el banco comunal porque en cada reunión afianza los lasos de amistada con todas sus compañeras del grupo.
 
La Señora. Mónica tiene 36 años de edad, está divorciada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 20 y 19 años, su primera hija estudia en una universidad de la ciudad y su segundo hijo tiene una discapacidad por lo que pasa en casa. La casa en la que vive es de su propia.

Doña Mónica pasa la mayor parte de su tiempo en casa al cuidado de su hogar, en su casa tiene una tienda de comestibles desde hace 5 años en la cual trabaja de domingo a domingo sin un horario fijo y también se dedica a la venta de cosméticos hace 7 años. 

Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de víveres para su negocio. 

Su meta es agrandar más su tienda.
texts.en:
The communal bank Tierra Fértil [Fertile Ground] is made up of seven members, most of whom are related to each other.  They all work daily at different work activities that allow them to contribute to their household incomes and provide for their families.  They are kind, friendly and charismatic, and they continue to maintain the culture and traditions of their people.

They live in the sector of Cochapamba, which belongs to the Valle parish of Cuenca.  This parish has seen a large amount of commercial growth, and its architecture is a mix of the traditional and the modern.

Monica is one of the members of this communal bank, and she has been a member for two years.  She says she likes being a member of the communal bank because each meeting reinforces the bonds of friendship among all of its members.

Monica is 36 years old, divorced and has a daughter, age 20, and a son, age 19.  Her daughter studies in the city university.  Her son has a disability, for which he stays at home.

Monica owns her own home, in which for five years now she has had a small grocery store.  She spends her time looking after her home and working her grocery business, which she operates daily without a fixed schedule.  She has also worked for seven years now at selling cosmetics.

With this loan Monica will buy supplies to stock her grocery store.  Her goal is to increase the size of her store.

loans.use: to buy supplies to stock her grocery store.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es: La Sra. Virginia tiene 33 años, tiene  dos hijos que son de las edades de  7 y de 10 años, sus niños se encuentran en edad escolar, ella se dedica a la venta de salchipapas,  hamburguesas simple y con papas en su puesto de venta que se encuentra en la zona de Villa Fátima,  este préstamo es el primero que tiene con la institución, la Sra. Virginia va a usar este préstamo para compra de insumos como salchicha y papa y demás productos que  utiliza para la elaboración de sus comidas, la Sra. Virginia enfrenta retos en su negocio que son el horario que tiene de venta ya que sale por las noches,  la señora puede ser víctima de delincuentes, borrachos y demás personas que merodean por la noche,  además del frio por la temporada de lluvia puede contraer enfermedades respiratorias, además de enfermedades musculares pero ella trabaja duro por el bienestar de sus hijos, ella  va a utilizar los beneficios en la compra de insumos para seguir mejorando en su negocio y  poder expandirse más y así poder ahorrar, y salir adelante. Su deseo de la Sra. Virginia es poder abrir su pensión de comida o snack propio y sacar adelante a sus dos hijos pequeños.
texts.en: Virginia is 33 and has two sons aged 7 and 10, who go to school. She sells a dish made with sausage and chips, as well as hamburgers with or without chips. Her fast-food stand is located in the area of Villa Fátima. This is Virginia's first loan with the field partner. She will use it to buy the ingredients she needs, such as sausage, potatoes, and others. She faces many difficulties in her business, one being that she works nights, and as such could fall prey to some delinquent, or be assaulted by a drunkard or any other shady character that roams the night. In the rainy season, the cold puts her at risk of contracting a respiratory disease, and all the hard work she does could result in pulling a muscle or developing back troubles. She works very hard for the sake of her sons, and is planning to use the profits from her food stall to keep improving her business and to expand it. She hopes to save some money and improve her lot in life. Her greatest dream is to open a small restaurant or food shop of her own and to be able to give her two small children a better life.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make the food she sells.

loans.name: Concepcion Catalina

texts.es: La Sra. Concepción sigue con la misma actividad de la fabricación y venta de calzados de mujer, ella trabaja junto a su esposo  nos conto  que le fue muy bien con el crédito, ahora incremento su producción, en esta ocasión solicita el crédito para la compra de cuero y materiales para la fabricación de calzados ya que en este último tiempo incremento su clientela.
texts.en: Concepción keeps at her business of making and selling women's shoes. She works together with her husband, and tells us that the last loan helped them tremendously. She is now stepping up her production, as she gained more customers, and is thus asking for a loan in order to buy leather and other supplies to make shoes.

loans.use: to buy leather to make shoes.

loans.name: Amabiel De Jesús

texts.es:
Amabiel es un joven de 28 años de edad, de familia campesina dedicada a la cosecha de café. Él ha continuado con la tradición y actualmente cuenta con un sembrado. Hace 6 años compró un local en el cual montó una discoteca con el fin de ofrecer un servicio del que carecía su comunidad. Actualmente alterna las dos actividades y cuenta con el apoyo de un empleado. Labora diariamente de 5:30 de la maña a 6:00 de la tarde de lunes a viernes y los fines de semana se encarga de la discoteca.
Su mayor sueño es convertirse en un gran empresario y caficultor, por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas y licor para su negocio. 
Espera que su proyecto de vida se haga realidad y pueda ofrecerles a sus padres una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Amabiel is 28 year old young man from a farming family that is engaged in coffee growing.  He has continued the tradition and currently has a sown field.  Six years ago, he bought a place where he opened a discothèque with the goal of providing a service that didn’t exist in his community.  Now, he alternates the two activities and has one employee to help him.  He works daily from 5:30 in the morning to 6:00 in the evening, Monday through Friday.  On the weekends, he takes care of the discothèque.  His greatest dream is to become a successful businessman and coffee grower.  He is requesting the loan to purchase farming inputs and liqueur for his business.  He hopes to make his life project a reality and be able to provide his parents with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase farming inputs and liqueur for his business.

loans.name: Margiana

texts.es: La Sra. Margiana tiene 33 años, ella se dedica a la venta de comida tiene una pequeña pensión que se encuentra ubicado en la zona de Tembladerani,  este préstamo es el primero que tiene con la institución, la Sra. Margiana va a usar este préstamo para compra de un horno industrial e insumos como papa,   abarrotes y demás productos que  utiliza para la elaboración de sus comidas, la Sra. Margiana  va a utilizar los beneficios en la compra de mesa y sillas ya que quiere ampliar su local para seguir mejorando en su negocio y  poder expandirse ya que tiene mucha clientela y ella desea brindar comodidad y variedad de platillos a su familia.
texts.en: Margiana is 33 years old. She sells food and owns a small restaurant located in the area of Tembladerani. This would be her first loan with the field partner. Margiana will use the funds to buy an industrial oven as well as supplies such as potatoes, groceries, and other products she uses as ingredients for preparing the meals. Her idea is to use the profits to buy chairs and tables, as she wants to enlarge her locale in order to keep improving and expanding her business, for she has many customers. She wants her family to have a comfortable life and eat varied meals.

loans.use: to buy an industrial oven as well as supplies.

loans.name: Los Laureles  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
Los Laureles es un banco comunal que está formado por 6 socias y 1 socio quienes viven por los alrededores de la parroquia Cumbe en Cuenca, lugar que se encuentra rodeado de mucha vegetación, tiene hermoso paisajes formados por su accidentada geografía, su centro es una mezcla de la arquitectura antigua con la moderna. Su gente  son personas amables y de un corazón muy cálido que buscan en el día a día mejorar su situación económica gracias a su esfuerzo y trabajo, laboran en la crianza de animales, agricultura y muchos laboran en la ciudad ejerciendo diferentes actividades, aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Norma, es una socia amable, gentil, luchadora y trabajadora que conforma el banco comunal Los Laureles desde hace 3 años.

La señora Norma tiene 28 años de edad, está separada de su marido pero en su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 11 y 2 años de edad, su primera hija estudia en una escuelita de la ciudad. La casa en la que vive es propia.
 
Doña Norma trabaja en la limpieza de una casa, actividad que la desempeña desde muy joven y trabaja de lunes a viernes todo el día. En su casa se dedica a la cría y venta de cerdos, pollos y cuyes. 

Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cerdos, pollos, cuyes y alimento para animales.

Su meta es agrandar su casa.
texts.en:
Los Laureles is a communal bank comprised of seven members (six women and a man), who all live in the village of Cumbe, in Cuenca, a place enshrined in vegetation, blessed with beautiful landscapes born of its mountainous surroundings, and whose centre is a happy mix of old and new architecture. The people there are charming and have a warm heart. They seek day after day to improve their standard of living by working hard and sparing no efforts. They grow crops or raise various kinds of animals, and, for the most part, also work in the city in various business sectors. They still uphold the culture and traditions of their forefathers.

Norma is one of the members of the group. Amiable, kind-hearted, hard-working, and full of fighting spirit, she has been a part of Los Laureles for three years.

She is twenty-eight and separated from her husband, with whom she has two children, aged 2 and 11. Her first daughter goes to a small school in their town. Norma lives in a house of her own.
 
Norma works as a cleaning lady Monday to Friday. She started when she was very young. At home, she raises pigs, chickens, and guinea pigs to sell.

Her new loan will go towards buying animals as well as feed.

Her goal is to add rooms to her house.

loans.use: to buy pigs, chickens, guinea pigs, and animal feed.

loans.name: Net's Group

texts.en:
Net lives in a rural area, located in the Kror Kor district of Pursat province, Cambodia. Net is a 59-year-old, married mother of seven children. To make a living, she has been farming rice and planting cassava for 33 years. The current business earns her about 8,000KHR per day, and she manages to save about 4,000KHR each day, after daily living expenses. 

Net has been with VisionFund for two loan cycles, and she completely paid back the past loans. Those loans have helped her to better support her family with enough food. Now she is leading her group of three to ask for a new loan. As the leader, Net is going to use her portion of the loan to buy fertilizer for her crops. She hopes to grow her rice timely and fruitfully, so as to make a living better.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for her farmland

loans.name: Phoern's Group

texts.en:
Born and raised in a rural village, located in the Kror Kor district of Pusat province, Phoern is 34 years old and married. She has two children, both of whom are dependent on her and in school. She and her husband have earned their living by farming rice and producing Khmer noodles, for 20 years. The current business earns her about 20,000KHR per day to meet the family's needs.
